item.title: Baci Di Alassio
item.description: They can be preserved at room temperature for roughly a week. I strongly advise against freezing. I think they are best after one or two days, not immediately after made.

item.title: Pasta al pesto
item.description: This is my personal version of “Pasta al pesto”, a recipe from Genova.

item.title: Pesto
